Key Match Events: Malawi lost 4-0 to Senegal in the previous match
Brighton Munthali is suspended for the match against Senegal after receiving a red card in the first leg
Pre-Game Insights: Malawi will hope to redeem their pride when they host Senegal in the 2025 TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) qualifiers
The Flames need a miracle to qualify for next year's Afcon finals
Group L leaders Burkina Faso have already booked a spot at the Afcon finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is on Mother's Day, and the Flames will fight for the win as a perfect gift to all mothers
Malawi are bottom of the group without a point while Burundi is third with three points from four matches
Others: Goalkeeper William Thole has been recalled to the squad to replace Brighton Munthali
Silver Strikers defender Maxwell Paipi and Zambia-based striker Chifundo Mphasi have been added to the squad
